description: ERECTION OF A 2 STOREY ROOF EXTENSION COMPRISING OF 5 SELF CONTAINED UNITS (1 x STUDIO 2 x 1 BED & 2 x 2 BED FLATS)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed development by reason of its design, height, scale, massing, and siting would fail to achieve a high standard of design, that respects, complements and relates positively to the host building or surrounding character of the area, contrary to Policies DM D2 (Design Considerations in all developments) and DM D3 (Alterations and extension to existing buildings) of Merton's Adopted Sites and Policies Plan (July 2014), Policy CS14 (Design) of Merton's adopted Core Planning Strategy (July 2011) and Policy 7.4 (Local Character) of the London Plan (2016).

Reason : 2 - The proposed development, located in an area with a PTAL score of 6a (very good), would generate additional pressure on parking in the area, and in the absence of a signed legal agreement securing a 'car free' agreement, the proposal would be contrary to contrary to Policies DM T1 (support for sustainable transport and active travel), DM T3 (Car parking and servicing standards) of Merton's Adopted Sites and Policies Plan (July 2014) and CS20 (Parking, Servicing and Delivery) of Merton's Adopted Core Planning Strategy (July 2011).
